Uses of Class
com.ikalagaming.entity.Entity

  • Packages that use Entity 
    Package Description
    com.ikalagaming.entity
    Classes relating to entities, which are objects in a game.
    com.ikalagaming.entity.component
    Individual parts of an entity that define what it is and what it can do.
    com.ikalagaming.entity.events
    Events dispatched relating to effects.
    com.ikalagaming.entity.powers
    Relate to powers that an entity may use.

    • Uses of Entity in com.ikalagaming.entity

      Subclasses of Entity in com.ikalagaming.entity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Player
      A player in the game which might be controlled by a human.

    • Uses of Entity in com.ikalagaming.entity.component

      Constructors in com.ikalagaming.entity.component with parameters of type Entity 
      Constructor and Description
      Effects(Entity owner)
      creates a new effects object with a reference to the owner

    • Uses of Entity in com.ikalagaming.entity.events

      Methods in com.ikalagaming.entity.events that return Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Entity EffectDeactivated.getTarget()
      Returns the entity that was the target of the effect.
      Entity EffectActivated.getTarget()
      Returns the entity that is the target of the effect
      Constructors in com.ikalagaming.entity.events with parameters of type Entity 
      Constructor and Description
      EffectActivated(Effect effect, Entity target)
      An effect was activated on the given target.
      EffectDeactivated(Effect effect, Entity target)
      An effect was removed from the given target.

    • Uses of Entity in com.ikalagaming.entity.powers

      Methods in com.ikalagaming.entity.powers with parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Power.applyEffect(Entity target)
      Applies this effect to the given entity.
      boolean ICaster.canUse(Entity entity)
      Returns true if the given entity is (currently) able to use this ability.
